channel.title: action on thecodecousins
channel.description: Recent content in action on thecodecousins

item.title: Building my Github Action to deliver doggoes to PRs
item.description: The long awaited GitHub Action feature is finally out of beta and ready to be present in every repositories. GitHub even organized a Hackathon through out March to encourage folks to create more awesome and useful actions. While browsing through the submissions, I found a cool GitHub Action that posts cat gifs on pull requests. Shout out to Ruairidh with his cool idea 👏👏👏. It’ll only do justice to dogs if there’s an action that deliver them good boys to our PRs.
